name: Space Rocks Survivors
author: Moolt
description:
Combines the simplicity of the Space Rocks tutorial with the ingenuity and modernity of a Survivors game. 
Survive as long as you can and choose great upgrades. But be careful! Each upgrade also includes a downgrade.
Move with W and S and control the direction with the mouse.

achievements.name: Bullet hell
achievements.description: Achieve multi shot with at least 10 bullets

achievements.name: Sharp shooter
achievements.description: Achieve multi shot with the least amount of bullet spread

achievements.name: Cash is king
achievements.description: Score multiplicator of 3 or bonus score of 150

achievements.name: Pacifist
achievements.description: Somehow manage to clear a stage without killing an enemy
